snippet: The NFL Network and NFL RedZone channels will be available for the first time this season to Cablevision customers.
abstract: NFL Network and the NFL Red-Zone channel are now available to many Cablevision subscribers.
lead_paragraph: The NFL Network and NFL RedZone channels will be available for the first time this season to Cablevision customers.

headline.seo: N.F.L. Channels Are Finally Available to Cablevision Subscribers
headline.main: N.F.L. Channels Available to Cablevision Subscribers
headline.print_headline: N.F.L. Channels Available To Cablevision Subscribers
